name: Jamestown Lighthouse
description: Historic lighthouse overlooking the harbor with colorful fishing boats and coastal views.

name: Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park
description: National monument dedicated to Ghana's first president and an educational museum about independence.

name: Labadi Beach
description: Popular city beach offering live drumming, horseback rides, and seaside relaxation.

name: Makola Market
description: Bustling open market known for fabrics, crafts, and vibrant local commerce.

name: National Museum of Ghana
description: Displays cultural and historical artifacts detailing Ghana's rich heritage and arts.

name: Osu Oxford Street
description: A lively street with restaurants, shops and nightlife — a hub for dining and social life.

name: La Palm Royal Beach Resort
description: Luxury beachfront hotel and event venue often hosting conferences and cultural events.

name: Arts Center & Craft Village
description: Handcrafts, kente textiles and souvenirs — a great place to connect with local artisans.
